movies.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
movies.title_english: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
movies.title_long: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days (2012)
movies.summary: Summer vacation started, and Greg has his own way to enjoy it with video games. However, his father wants him to go outside and stop playing video games, and his mother has her own plans, including a reading club. In addition, Greg can't get along with his father. The only thing they have in common is the hatred for the Lil Cutie Comics. Things only get worse after the stay at the beachside cabin goes totally wrong. Will anything go right? At least there's Holly Hills.
movies.description_full: Summer vacation started, and Greg has his own way to enjoy it with video games. The only thing they have in common is the hatred for the Lil Cutie Comics. Things only get worse after the stay at the beachside cabin goes totally wrong. Will anything go right? At least there's Holly Hills.

The only thing they have in common is the hatred for the Lil Cutie Comics. Things only get worse after the stay at the beachside cabin goes totally wrong. Will anything go right? movies.title: Ruin and Rose
movies.summary: A surreal future leaves the world without water and consumed by sand: the Big Empty. A group of children survives alone on the edge of the endless desert in the ruin of the now. When a young boy unearths an ancient relic hinting at the lost wonders of winter, he sets off in search of the ghosts that once called the mountains their home. This bold cinematic experience balances stunning skiing with a wild and hopeful journey into the forgotten lands of myth and magic beyond the Empty. Acclaimed writer/director Ben Sturgulewski joins the award-winning team at Matchstick Productions and their two decades of filmmaking expertise to deliver "RUIN AND ROSE," an epic creative vision brought to life by the talents of the world's top skiers. Winter landscapes across the planet contrast seamlessly with a thoroughly-crafted story of environmental apocalypse, shot entirely within the otherworldly expanses of Africa's Skeleton Coast. Unlike anything seen before, the dreamlike setting of this film ...

movies.title: King of Knives
movies.summary: A New York family implodes over three days as they careen through mid-life and quarter-life crises.
movies.description_full: A New York family implodes over three days as they careen through mid-life and quarter-life crises.
movies.synopsis: A New York family implodes over three days as they careen through mid-life and quarter-life crises.

movies.title: Ice Soldiers
movies.summary: A scientist discovers the bodies of three frozen genetically modified Russians buried in the Canadian North. Upon thawing them out he realizes he has unleashed a deadly threat to Western society and must stop them at all costs.
movies.description_full: A scientist discovers the bodies of three frozen genetically modified Russians buried in the Canadian North. Upon thawing them out he realizes he has unleashed a deadly threat to Western society and must stop them at all costs.
